svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 11, 2023" date: "2023-11-11"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from
Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : Goerli shadowfork 0 upgraded to Dencun ( testing analysis
) Blob gas price in RPC: adding single blobGasPrice method & adding to feeHistory
EIP7545 (Verkle proof verification precompile) presented
* Goerli shadowfork 0 upgraded to Dencun ( testing analysis )
Goerli shadowfork 0 upgraded to Dencun ( testing analysis )
* Blob gas price in RPC: adding single blobGasPrice method & adding to feeHistory
Blob gas price in RPC: adding single blobGasPrice method & adding to feeHistory
* EIP7545 (Verkle proof verification precompile) presented
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* üö® Lido at 31.48% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.48% is increasing towards 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~85%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 43% &
Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~85% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 43% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
* Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of
US/Canada/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Layer 1
* Otterscan v2.2-ALPHA : improved Sourcify integration and UI improvements
Otterscan v2.2-ALPHA : improved Sourcify integration and UI improvements
* Reth snapshots : public snapshots by merkle, sync a node in 6 hours
Reth snapshots : public snapshots by merkle, sync a node in 6 hours
For Stakers
* Stereum v2 (node launcher): install/manage node via UI
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.12.0 : various updates, upgrade validator & beacon node
clients together Nimbus v23.10.1 : hotfix for peer scoring issue in v23.10.0
Consensus layer:
* Lodestar v1.12.0 : various updates, upgrade validator & beacon node clients together
Lodestar v1.12.0 : various updates, upgrade validator & beacon node clients together
* Nimbus v23.10.1 : hotfix for peer scoring issue in v23.10.0
Nimbus v23.10.1 : hotfix for peer scoring issue in v23.10.0
* Execution layer: Nethermind v1.22.0 : improved memory management (consumption reduced
Execution layer:
* Nethermind v1.22.0 : improved memory management (consumption reduced ~25%)
Research
* Validator smoothing commitments : out of protocol solution to improve permissionless
liquid staking protocols, node operators pay upfront to run validators for a minimum
duration
Validator smoothing commitments : out of protocol solution to improve permissionless
* Inclusion list framework to evaluate designs on censorship resistance metrics
Inclusion list framework to evaluate designs on censorship resistance metrics
* MEV burn benefits : improves validator economics, lessens builder liquidity
requirements, increases cost of censorship and improves resilience in a mass MEV event
MEV burn benefits : improves validator economics, lessens builder liquidity
* Signature Merge : massive-scale signature aggregation using recursive SNARKs & PCD
Signature Merge : massive-scale signature aggregation using recursive SNARKs & PCD
Layer 2
* OP Reth : Reth (execution layer client) can be used in OP Stack
OP Reth : Reth (execution layer client) can be used in OP Stack
* Justin Drake: based rollup/validium preconfirmations of transaction execution,
latencies on the order of 100ms
Justin Drake: based rollup/validium preconfirmations of transaction execution,
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs EIP7553 : Separated payer transaction
EIPs
* EIP7553 : Separated payer transaction
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7554 : NFTs benefits attachment via metadata (ERC721
extension) ERC7555 : Single sign-on for account discovery ERC7556 : Embedded accounts
as smart modules
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7554 : NFTs benefits attachment via metadata (ERC721 extension)
ERC7554 : NFTs benefits attachment via metadata (ERC721 extension)
* ERC7555 : Single sign-on for account discovery
ERC7555 : Single sign-on for account discovery
* ERC7556 : Embedded accounts as smart modules
ERC7556 : Embedded accounts as smart modules
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.8.23 : fixes invalid verbatim deduplication bug
Solidity v0.8.23 : fixes invalid verbatim deduplication bug
* Remix v0.37.0 : adds Semaphore Circom template, auto-complete loads ERC files and
translations in Spanish/French/Italian/Simplified Chinese
Remix v0.37.0 : adds Semaphore Circom template, auto-complete loads ERC files and
* Secureum RACE #23: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
Secureum RACE #23: 8 question Solidity quiz & answers
* Fe (language) bug bounty: Simple DAO
Fe (language) bug bounty: Simple DAO
* Proposal for Edge (EVM domain specific language), currently at specification stage
Proposal for Edge (EVM domain specific language), currently at specification stage
* Superchain faucet : claim 0.05 testnet ETH for OP Stack testnets
Superchain faucet : claim 0.05 testnet ETH for OP Stack testnets
* 500 testnet ETH (Sepolia & Hole≈°ky) claimable by Devconnect attendees using Zupass
500 testnet ETH (Sepolia & Hole≈°ky) claimable by Devconnect attendees using Zupass
* Zupass Scaffold-ETH 2 starter kit
Zupass Scaffold-ETH 2 starter kit
* pcaversaccio‚Äôs Hardhat template : updated to ethers v6 & Hardhat configuration
variables
pcaversaccio‚Äôs Hardhat template : updated to ethers v6 & Hardhat configuration
* VSCode Solidity inspector : adds support for .tree files
VSCode Solidity inspector : adds support for .tree files
* EVM tracing reference
EVM tracing reference
* TypeChain deprecated
TypeChain deprecated
Security
* AAVE security incident , forks of v2/v3 should disable stable rate mode borrowing
AAVE security incident , forks of v2/v3 should disable stable rate mode borrowing
* MEV bot $2 million exploit via unprotected swap function
MEV bot $2 million exploit via unprotected swap function
* Raft 1.6k ETH exploit , 1570 ETH burnt, attacker lost 4 ETH
Raft 1.6k ETH exploit , 1570 ETH burnt, attacker lost 4 ETH
* The Standard on Arbitrum $260k exploit via price manipulation
The Standard on Arbitrum $260k exploit via price manipulation
* zkSync Era vulnerability disclosed , 50k USDC bounty paid
zkSync Era vulnerability disclosed , 50k USDC bounty paid
Ecosystem
* Devconnect live stream for selected events
Devconnect live stream for selected events
* ETH Lisbon hackathon projects
ETH Lisbon hackathon projects
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.9 to 323.6 gwei, with 28.9 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 21.7 gwei 6.6k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.9 to 323.6 gwei, with 28.9 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 21.7 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.7 gwei
* 6.6k ETH net burn this week
6.6k ETH net burn this week
* ETHUSD : $1,829 - $2,133, currently $2,080
ETHUSD : $1,829 - $2,133, currently $2,080
* ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.056 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* USDC & EURC v2.2 : phased rollout, reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
USDC & EURC v2.2 : phased rollout, reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
* Coinbase Verifications : onchain user attestations for account & country verified by
Coinbase, uses Ethereum Attestation Service (EAS)
Coinbase Verifications : onchain user attestations for account & country verified by
* Sablier UI dynamic streams : adds timelock, unlock-linear & unlock-cliff
Sablier UI dynamic streams : adds timelock, unlock-linear & unlock-cliff
* CoW Swap programmatic orders : approve orders with a single signature, execute
automatically
CoW Swap programmatic orders : approve orders with a single signature, execute
* Notional v3 live on Arbitrum, adds variable rate lending/borrowing & leveraged
liquidity strategies
Notional v3 live on Arbitrum, adds variable rate lending/borrowing & leveraged
* Show Up (RSVP for events): request deposits on registration, attendees get paid for
showing up
Show Up (RSVP for events): request deposits on registration, attendees get paid for
* Bountycaster (bounties platform) live on Farcaster, beta
Bountycaster (bounties platform) live on Farcaster, beta
* Gaslite Drop adds airdrop to X (Twitter) post replies, filter & token gate recipients
Gaslite Drop adds airdrop to X (Twitter) post replies, filter & token gate recipients
* Sound magic upload : zero gas upload, only requires an email address
Sound magic upload : zero gas upload, only requires an email address
* Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art : NFT creator contest (AI, generative, music & 1of1s), 1M OP
in prizes
Optimism We ‚ù§Ô∏è The Art : NFT creator contest (AI, generative, music & 1of1s), 1M OP in
prizes
Job Listings
* Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
Aragon: Senior smart contract developer w EIP, auditing experience
* Nethermind: Smart Contract Auditor , Smart Contract Auditor (Rust) & BizDev
Nethermind: Smart Contract Auditor , Smart Contract Auditor (Rust) & BizDev
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
* ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
* Gnosis seek DevRels & Backend Devs
Gnosis seek DevRels & Backend Devs
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit).¬† Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* UK FCA & Bank of England proposals for regulating stablecoins
UK FCA & Bank of England proposals for regulating stablecoins
* OFAC sanctioned Ekaterina Zhdanova for laundering & moving funds on behalf of Russian
elites
OFAC sanctioned Ekaterina Zhdanova for laundering & moving funds on behalf of Russian
* SEC facing challenges hiring crypto specialists due to prohibition of holding
SEC facing challenges hiring crypto specialists due to prohibition of holding
* Open problems in DAOs for researchers
Open problems in DAOs for researchers
* DAO decentralization : Voting-Bloc Entropy (VBE) decentralization metric & a
practical Dark DAO
DAO decentralization : Voting-Bloc Entropy (VBE) decentralization metric & a practical
Dark DAO
General
* Exchange hacks: $126M for Poloniex
Exchange hacks: $126M for Poloniex
* ApeFest attendees report eye/skin issues , likely caused by UV lights
ApeFest attendees report eye/skin issues , likely caused by UV lights
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week‚Äôs news in real time.
Permalink for this week‚Äôs issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-november-11-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Nov 13-19 ‚Äì Devconnect (Istanbul), update 2
Nov 13-19 ‚Äì Devconnect (Istanbul), update 2
* Nov 15-21 ‚Äì DCxPrague (Devconnect satellite event in Prague)
Nov 15-21 ‚Äì DCxPrague (Devconnect satellite event in Prague)
* Nov 15-29 ‚Äì Gitcoin Grants 19
Nov 15-29 ‚Äì Gitcoin Grants 19
* Nov 16-19 ‚Äì Pragma & ETHGlobal Istanbul
Nov 16-19 ‚Äì Pragma & ETHGlobal Istanbul
* Nov 18 ‚Äì Ethereum Costa Rica
Nov 18 ‚Äì Ethereum Costa Rica
* Nov 30 ‚Äì Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
Nov 30 ‚Äì Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
* Dec 4 ‚Äì ETHVenice
Dec 4 ‚Äì ETHVenice
* Dec 6-7 ‚Äì Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
Dec 6-7 ‚Äì Columbia CryptoEconomics workshop (New York)
* Dec 8-10 ‚Äì ETHGlobal ETHIndia (Bangalore)
Dec 8-10 ‚Äì ETHGlobal ETHIndia (Bangalore)
